Reviews.Title: “Very Clean & Excellent Breakfast!!!”
Reviews.Author: Deborah B
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were so Impressed by the friendly staff, Greg & Colleen! The room was VERY clean, as was the overall grounds. We left to see a show and when we got back, the place was packed. Greg & Colleen worked their tails off to make sure everyone's needs were met. I think the best part was the breakfast. They cook it right there in the kitchen!!! Scrambled Eggs, Gravy, It was wonderful!!! The pool was super, we took a swim right before we had to leave. We will definitely be back, THE NEW OWNER & MANAGEMENT HAVE TAKEN THIS PROPERTY TO A NEW LEVEL OF EXCELLENCE!!!

Reviews.Title: “"Never seen anything like it"”
Reviews.Author: lhdupree
Reviews.Content: These people (especially Colleen) bent over backwards to meet our every need. Our senior adult church group felt like we had some new friends by the time we left. One of our ladies fell and broke her arm at a store, and the Inn staff helped her and her roommate move to a handicapped room with not a penny difference in cost. Great hot breakfast, good-smelling rooms and facilities, friendly service, great prices--we WILL be going back!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for dogs and family”
Reviews.Author: Patty M
Reviews.Content: This was a first time staying there. I will go back and stay there anytime. We took our 3 dogs and the room was great, and the hotel was dog friendly. They are going to redue there dog rooms and I can not wait to see them. I am going to tell all my friends to go there. There breakfast was great. Very easy to get in and out of and close to back ways around the strip. Also I am so inpressed because the rooms was very quit even with several dogs. Very wounderful people ruining it. Thanks for the great stay and will see you again. Patty Mc

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for family”
Reviews.Author: Donna M
Reviews.Content: Staff was very friendly, made us feel right at home! Rooms clean! Hot tub was great after a day of shopping! Breakfast was great! First time ever having a real breakfast, not just doughnuts and juice, like most places you stay!!! Thank you MS Mary for a great start to a great day! -The Mathis Family

Reviews.Title: “good place overall”
Reviews.Author: Paul C
Reviews.Content: continental breakfast was was of the best we've ever had,(we travel quite frequently), room was very nice, clean, and quiet, price was was good, the staff members were great, nice pool and hot tub, nice game room by the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Mike S
Reviews.Content: Breakfast room and office were very clean and smelled wonderful. Breakfast room was very well stocked. Everyone was friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. Hot tub and pool were clean and perfect temperature. Game Room was clean and had several things to do in it. Motel and landscaping were very well maintained and clean. Will go back soon and continue to stay here every time I come to town. Best value I have found for the money. Karen D. from Saint Louis, MO

Reviews.Title: “Nice quiet stay”
Reviews.Author: Heather E
Reviews.Content: This is a nice quiet hotel off of the busy strip in Branson. The staff was very friendly and welcoming. The pool was nice. Breakfast was yummy! We stayed at this same hotel 13 years prior on our honeymoon and wanted to stay there for our anniversary. It had been kept up well.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly People”
Reviews.Author: ChrisSchoenle
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I recently stayed at Ozark valley Inn and had a great time, The staff Gregg, Jay Collien and Mary also know as "Mom" were very joyful. Breakfast was wonderful and everyone seemed to enjoy how they made them feel. Great tips on places to visit. Pool was nice and clean even after a raining evening and the Pool Table was a great entertainment for all of us. We will fro sure come stay again. :)

Reviews.Title: “fishing trip.”
Reviews.Author: margaret c
Reviews.Content: very nice place and breakfast was verrrry Good! and good rates. Jay& Greg done good.

Reviews.Title: “Good motel for the price”
Reviews.Author: Melkyy
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay in Ozark Valley Inn @ Branson. Room was clean, hot breakfast w/ eggs was tasty, and the staff was friendly. Good motel for $49 a night.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, affordable dog-friendly place”
Reviews.Author: r r
Reviews.Content: We arrived late late, very tired, with a dogie. I had to call the number on the front door to get registered. The response was immediate, and gracious. The place was clean and very affordable. It isn't easy to find inexpensive places that are nice to stay in, and accept dogs without some huge fee / penalty.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable rates, great customer service”
Reviews.Author: Cin W
Reviews.Content: The new owners are doing a great job of upgrading this property. Nice, quiet place to rest from the rest of Branson and the staff was super helpful & pleasant. Good breakfast to get you started and wifi was installed on the 2nd day we were there.

Reviews.Title: “Very pet-friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: Luvnutrition
Reviews.Content: We traveled with 2 small dogs and liked what we received for the price! The pet-friendly rooms are at the back of the hotel with easy access to a large area in which to walk the dogs - plenty of green space and some wooded area too. Even though the rooms were full of dogs, did not hear any barking and the other guests were very nice. Unfortunately the WI-fi does not reach back to these rooms, but you can go to the lobby or just sit in your car outside the lobby and get wi-fi. The couple who run the hotel are very nice and accomodating. The room was your typical hotel room -had a lot of cable channels to choose from. The shower head was a little low (I am 5'6" and it was just at eye level). The breakfast is very continental - cold cereal, coffee, juice, donuts and toast were the offerings. But it held us over until lunch. This hotel is just off of the main strip and very easy to get in and out of. Liked the fact that we did not have to deal with traffic unless we wanted to go on 76.

Reviews.Title: “Second worst motel I've ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: burgerflipper
Reviews.Content: This is NOT the place to stay. The room was $90 and worth $0, maybe. The room was dirty, the jacuzzi was dirty, the lamp on the table had no plug on the end of the cord, the coffee pot had moldy grounds in it, no fridge, no microwave, wi-fi was useless, bed hard, we stayed in July 2011 but the room had Thanksgiving decorations in it. The a/c did work good and the pool was clean. Other than that, it was a terrible experience. I stayed here about 10 years ago and it was one of the nicest places I've ever stayed. But new owners apparently don't care about the quality of service.

HotelInfo.Name: Ozark Valley Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2693 Shepherd of the Hills Expressway, Branson, MO 65616
